column4: I have .deb on Desktop.. what command do I need to install it?
cache does the same thing as apt-get and aptitude?
no, not quite... i think its more of a search type thing like sudo aptitude search ...
ah ok. I didn't know that until now. thanks again
no problem. i learned a couple of days ago myself.
I am about to install it.. is it good as it looks on the site? useful?
a little slow, mostly because they've just changed the code to have it work in linux more like a wine thing.
hmm, So you advice me to install it anyway and give it a try?
Yes. Its handy and cool and works well. I just like F-Spot better.
